description: Discover the life of your dreams overlooking the spectacular San Juan reservoir. Imagine the luxury of a life steeped in nature, just 75 km from Madrid, this incredible property will open your eyes to a whole new world of well-being and style. In a stunning natural enclave contemplating the Pantano de San Juan, the chance of a lifetime is beckoning, complete with jaw-dropping views, immaculate gardens and a stunning swimming pool, welcome to your own private paradise, just 75 km from Madrid. Think of it as an oasis of luxury amid nature’s raw beauty. A mere jaunt from the punchier energies of the capital, enfolded in lovingly tended Mediterranean woodland, it invites you to discover an exceptional lifestyle on the shores of the exclusive Pantano de San Juan. This exquisite property is set in a peaceful gated development embodying all the values of today’s premium buyer: preserving nature, security, privacy, leisure, ease and community. Find your zen in a beautiful natural setting as you experience the true luxury of carefree living. Love the water? Adventure awaits at the private sailing club, whether you’re craving the rush of motorised watersports or the pure joy of a dip from a pristine blue-flag beach. The property is set on a 1,250 sqm plot, expertly landscaped to a stunning multilevel design that makes a virtue of the undulating terrain, complementing the mesmerising panoramic views. Each blissful corner is primed for your enjoyment, from your own private viewing platform to the spectacular swimming pool with its twin palapas: an irresistible invitation to dive in, relax and bask in your surroundings. The main living space is arranged on a single level, comprising an elegantly proportioned living-dining room, a kitchen opening onto the garden, a guest bathroom and an en-suite bedroom. On every side, breathtaking views of the reservoir compete for your attention, all the more captivating when enjoyed from the fabulous terrace. Downstairs, we find an inviting sitting room, three double bedrooms, family bathroom and the master bedroom, which is fully en-suite. Two of the bedrooms enjoy direct access to the front garden. The property also benefits from generous terracing, offering close to 200 sqm of outdoor space — ideal for family gatherings — and a versatile recreation room with its own WC that would make the perfect music studio, workshop or children’s party room. And there’s no need to compromise when it comes to travelling in comfort: an extra-large garage provides a spacious home for several cars. There’s even room to stash a boat when sailing season is over. This extraordinary property has mastered the balance between luxury living and the pure exhilaration of nature. Paradise awaits, and it’s flaunting some serious style. Sometimes dreams really do come true.

SWEET HOUSE SELLS NO AGENCY COMMISSION Individual detached villa for sale in the exclusive "Costa de Madrid" urbanization. This magnificent property has a constructed area of 216 m² distributed over two floors. The house, built in 2004, stands out for its top qualities and its impeccable state of conservation. On the main floor, we find a spacious 30 square meter living room with access to a terrace, ideal for enjoying pleasant moments outdoors. The fully equipped kitchen has high and low furniture and a window passes dishes towards the living room. In addition, on this floor there is a complete bathroom with a shower tray. On the upper floor, there are the four bedrooms, all of them exterior and very bright. Three of the bedrooms are double and have fitted wardrobes lined with drawers. The master suite has two built-in wardrobes and a full bathroom with a bathtub. The 2064 square meter plot is another of the strong points of this property. In it we can find a large garden with fruit trees and pine trees, a pond, a barbecue area with a wooden and concrete table, and three outdoor sheds for garden tools and machinery. In addition, the farm has automatic and manual irrigation throughout the plot. The property also has a covered garage with capacity for three cars, a boiler room and diesel tank, a games room and a storage room. In addition, the urbanization has exclusive access and is located just 200 meters from the reservoir. Don't miss the opportunity to visit this spectacular house at any time, as tours are available even on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.

Mavericks Inmobiliaria exclusively markets this fabulous property in the San Ramón urbanization. The distribution is as follows: Ground Floor: Upon entering, we have a large and comfortable entrance hall. To the north of the Hall we access a large 72m2 living room with fireplace. After the living room, we have the master bedroom, which has a dressing room and en-suite bathroom. From the living-dining room you access a large, fully covered outdoor porch with very pleasant views. The entire floor is covered and surrounded by a comfortable and practical outdoor porch. It has a barbecue area. Basement: 43 m2 room with fireplace and laundry area. The property is built on a plot of 3950 m2. They are plots 217, 218 and 219 of the urbanization. The plot is in a fantastic state of conservation, it has been and is very well cared for. We have a modern and designer swimming pool on the plot itself. The house has access by vehicle and parking for several cars. Located in an enclave where you can breathe a lot of peace and tranquility, a few meters from the San Juan reservoir, you can enjoy a home to live in or as a second residence where you can enjoy great serenity. The City of San Ramon is a private urbanization with 24-hour surveillance. You will have a sports center, sports areas, an outpatient clinic, a variety of supermarkets, restaurants and leisure areas just 10 minutes away by car. The Pantano de San Juan is a natural beach complex that is located just 65 km from the capital of Madrid. It is located between the municipalities of San Martín de Valdeiglesias and Pelayos de la Presa. In this swamp are two of the busiest and most suitable beaches for bathing in the Madrid community: Playa de la Virgen de la Nueva and Playa de El Muro. It is the first inland beach with a blue flag in the Community of Madrid and you can also enjoy rides on permitted boats. Regarding communications, it is located just 1 hour from the Center of Madrid through the M-501. Optionally, the property owns two plots adjacent to the property, which could be acquired for a price of €250,000. Both have an area of 2180m2, where you could build a house of 545 m2. They are plots 213 and 214. If you have any questions or want to arrange a visit, do not hesitate to contact us.

Design Villa with spectacular San JuanLake views The seventies were, indeed, an interesting phase of cultural and social impact, in which designers tried to find their way to leave their mark. They represent a reaction against purified mid-century modernism, in favor of "playful embellishment and radical experimentation with form." Personal expression and individuality were the hallmarks of the time. In architecture, the use of unconventional materials such as glass, wood and concrete was very common. In addition, the integration of the buildings into the surrounding natural landscape was sought, which gave rise to designs that had a strong relationship with the environment. The lake house of almost 900 m2 (including pool and garage) and on a beautiful and wooded plot of almost 5000 m2, was built by the German architect Kurt Schäffer known for his designs of straight lines, high ceilings, huge windows with in order to integrate outdoor nature by creating beautiful works of art seen through the glass, and on this occasion, using wood, iron, concrete and stone. It should be noted that all the details are perfectly designed, they look and function as if they were state-of-the-art. This particular house is located on the shores of a beautiful lake, El Pantano de San Juan, which gives its residents the opportunity to enjoy stunning panoramic views from anywhere on the property. Due to its large size, it allows its owners to enjoy large spaces both inside and outside. The Pantano de San Juan is a natural beach complex that is located just 65 km from the capital of Madrid. It is located between the municipalities of San Martín de Valdeiglesias and Pelayos de la Presa. In this swamp are two of the busiest and most suitable beaches for bathing in the Madrid community: Playa de la Virgen de la Nueva and Playa de El Muro. In 2018, Virgen de la Nueva Beach, also known as "Madrid Beach", was declared a Blue Flag, as a symbol of the clarity standards that the San Martín de Valdeiglesias City Council proposed and achieved. It is the first inland beach with a blue flag in the Community of Madrid and you can also enjoy rides on permitted boats. One of the most striking features of this house is its exclusive design. Every detail has been carefully thought out and executed to create an elegant and sophisticated atmosphere. The high-quality materials used in its construction, such as wood and glass, provide a feeling of luxury and refinement. Brightness is another highlight of this house. The large windows allow natural light to flood each room, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere. Furthermore, being located in a natural environment, the house benefits from the natural light that passes through its large windows, which further increases the feeling of luminosity.  The interior of the house has been designed to offer maximum comfort and functionality. The 7 bedrooms guarantee more than enough space to accommodate a large family or guests since this property has an apartment for this purpose, with a separate entrance, equipped kitchen, living room, full bathroom and two bedrooms. It is important to mention the winery and, no less important, the direct access to the Reservoir with its own boathouse. Each bedroom with its private bathroom has been created to provide spaciousness, comfort and privacy to each of the residents. The house also has large common areas with immensely high ceilings, such as the living room, dining room and kitchen. These areas, linked together by different levels, are designed to encourage interaction and enjoyment in the company of family and friends. The open spaces and smart layout allow residents to enjoy fluidity of movement and a feeling of ease and freedom. On the top floor, it is important to mention the spectacular living room with its incredible open-air library which allows you to easily get any book of interest and in addition to the beautiful views of the landscape.
